amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to enforce the Davis-Bacon wage scale.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the prevailing wage requirements in subchapter IV of chapter 31, of title 40, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 239 (Roll no. 388).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 239 (Roll no. 388).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. King (IA).
